title: Voyageurs National Park: Kabetogama Lake
body: Kabetogama Lake Area Programs and Tours        Explore Kabetogama Lake and Namakan Lake aboard the Amik.          Take a cruise to Kettle Falls and immerse yourself into the history. NPS  Amik Tour Boat Schedule All Voyageur and Amik tour boat reservations are handled by Recreation.gov and can now be made, starting April 15 annually, in advance either online or by telephone. Please see the Voyageur National Park Boat Tour Reservation page for more information about this system. Kettle Falls Cruise (accessible) Voyage to historic Kettle Falls Hotel and Dam. Spend 2 hours on land to dine at the hotel, enjoy a picnic lunch, or explore the hotel and nearby dam. Tour fees do not include meals. Adult $40, Child $20, Toddler (2 and under) $3. Reservations recommended. (6-passenger minimum) June 19- August 19, 2016 Sunday, Tuesday, Friday 10 am- 3:30 pm  Thursday 3:00 pm- 8:30 pm  August 23- September 22, 2016 Tuesday, Thursday 10 am- 3:30 pm        Do you have what it takes to be a voyageur? NPS  Canoe Programs North Canoe Paddle back in history aboard a 26-foot North Canoe. Learn the voyageur paddle salute and explore the life of a voyageur. Minimum age is 5, paddling required, and weather dependent. Reservations recommended. Call (218) 875-2111. Free. June 21- August 18, 2016 Tuesday,Thursday 10:30 pm-12 noon  Looking for a sneak peak of a North Canoe tour?  Check out the North Canoe Promo video!      Other Naturalist-led Programs Twilight Walk into the Past Join park staff as they portray a historic character from the region's past. Let the whispers of a different time come alive. Meet at the Woodenfrog Refectory. Call (218) 875-2111. Free. June 22- August 17, 2016 Wednesday 8:30pm- 9:30pm
